column5: My daughter and I managed to catch 18 Walleye today and managed to keep 6... most were in the slot.  here's a pic.

Nice looking fish Dan.  I wasn't able to make it to Sturgeon falls/nippissing this year for the first time in about a dozen or so years.   The guys I usually went with were too tied up with work this year.  Hopefully next year we'll be able to put our annual trip together again.  I sure miss your part of the country at this time of the year ! Rob V
I ran in to your usual guide today......I outfished him..  :thumbsup_anim:  But he managed to catch a 28.5" and a 25" this morning...
Great report and pic Randy  It sure looked like it was a great day for catching eyes on the Sturgeon Thanks for sharing Leechman
dang they are some fine walleye there
Way to go Randy.  Did you see Mario , Al or both ?
Nice walleye Randy 18 today thats not a bad day at all your daughter must of had a blast. Those 6 will make a nice meal  Rob
Nice job Randy!  I tried that batter once that you have on the table.  It made me sleepy...lol  Cheers  Craig
Some very nice fat northern ontario fall walleyes randy !!!!   your daughter must have had alot of fun in the boat today,those walleyes would even be better than a turkey dinner for sure !!...cheers
Megan was coughing on the water ... when it came time to take the pics she had put her PJ's on and grabbed the bottle of cough syrup...  That's what I take when I run out of Beer!

I seen Mario...  he was in a BIG fiberglass tub...25 foot or so.   ......  EH!   Clamp-It .....how do you know Mario &  Al   S...?................I used to work w/ Mario and I know Al pretty good too.... I did the airbrush on his limo.
I see 3 Wall-ice and 3 Pickerals in that pic (the big ones are Wall-ice)  Nice fish and pic!!!

That 25 foot fiberglass unit is likely the boat they took us out in the last 3 years.  They took us (3 or 4 guys) plus Mario and the boat owner, Mario's buddy Al - over to the mouth of the french.  Al's from southern ontario but spends a lot of time fishing Nippising.  We had great fishing out there the last 3 years and as you know Mario (and Al) know the water there pretty well.  Great guys, great water and great fishing.   Sure missed it this year.
great day on the water nice eyes
Some nice healthy fish Randy did you use any special presentation to catch them?
Very noice bud.  Whatcha mean most were "IN" in the slot?!  cheers HD
Couple good meals there, nice haul...
